animal.question: I say “Meow” and like to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
😴 I take many naps.

animal.question: I wag my tail and bark. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like to play fetch.
🏡 I protect your house.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🩱 I have webbed feet.
🌾 I eat plants and insects.
🦢 Some people think I look like a swan, but smaller.

animal.question: I give milk and say “Moo”. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat grass in the field.
🔔 Farmers often put a bell around my neck.
🥛 My milk is used to make cheese and yogurt.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🚿 I use my trunk to spray water.
🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes help me hide in the tall grass.
🐎 I look like a horse, but with stripes.
🌍 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I roar and I'm the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a big mane around my head.
🥩 I am a carnivore.
🦁 I belong to the cat family.

animal.question: I hop and carry my baby in a pouch. What am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I live in Australia.
🌱 I like to eat eucalyptus leaves.
🦘 I have strong legs for jumping.

animal.question: I hiss and slither on the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I don't have any legs.
🐁 I hunt mice and other small animals.
👅 I flick my tongue to smell.

animal.question: I waddle and slide on the ice. What am I?

hints.text: 🐧 I live in the Antarctica.
🐟 I eat fish.
⚫ I'm a bird that can't fly, but I can swim really well.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain or snow. Birds don't like me because I can mess up their nests. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I am light and can be blown around
🌳 I come from trees
🍂 I am often colorful in the fall

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and I fall from the sky when it's very cold. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am cold and melt when it's warm
☃️ You can make a snowman with me
✨ Each of us has a unique shape

weather.question: I'm a big ball of light that keeps us warm during the day. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I come out in the morning
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm bright
🌡️ I give warmth to the earth

weather.question: I'm a big, white thing in the sky. Sometimes I block the sun and sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like a fluffy sheep
🌧️ Sometimes I'm dark and full of water
🌬️ I float in the sky

weather.question: I fall from the sky and make everything wet. You need an umbrella to keep dry. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am water
☔ Plants need me to grow
🌧️ I come from clouds

weather.question: I am a loud noise in the sky that comes with lightning. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I come during a storm
👂 You can hear me, but you can't see me first
💥 I am a boom in the sky

weather.question: I am frozen rain that falls from the sky. I can be small or big and hard. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am made of ice
🤕 Sometimes I can hurt if I hit you
🌨️ I fall from storm clouds

weather.question: I am a powerful, spinning storm that forms over warm ocean waters. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have a very strong wind
🌊 I can cause lots of damage to the coast
🌬️ I am a type of tropical cyclone

weather.question: I'm a warm blanket of air that traps heat near the Earth. Too much of me can make the Earth warmer. What am I referring to?

hints.text: 🌎 I am important to keep the earth from freezing.
💨 Too much of me might cause climate change
🔥 I am the natural trapping of heat near earth's surface.

weather.question: I am a period of very low rainfall, causing water shortages and making the ground dry and cracked. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ This happens when it doesn't rain for a long time.
🌾 Farmers worry about this for their crops.
🌵 Deserts get a lot of me.
